attributes.action: Ban Muslim women from wearing veils in the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The veil (burqa, niqab, ḥijab) is clearly a sign of separation, clearly a sign of wanting to avoid assimilating into western culture. The veil does not make other people feel comfortable. No to Sharia law, no to veils. If you're here, be British.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
